u.a: <bef> sits at table with snack . <aft> reaches for cookie
runs to table . leans to take drink . glances at camera
<bef> nods . looks at Mother . <dur> reaches for cookie
<bef> breaks cookie . <dur> eats . looks at Mother
pats Frank's side with back of hand
looks around room , following Frank's eyes . looks at Frank
<bef> looks at fingers . looks at Mother . <dur> looks at cookie
<bef> eats icing . <dur> struggles to break cookie
<bef> offers Mother half of cookie . looks at Mother . <dur> holds up cookie
shakes head . <aft> gives cookie to Frank
<1u> makes a surprised face . <2u> looks at Investigator
<bef> turns , looks at Mother . <dur> walks away
<bef> smiles . nods . <dur> shakes head . looks at cookie
shrugs shoulders . looks at Mother . eats
<bef> looks at Frank . <dur> puts hand on stomach . <aft> looks at Investigator . moves closer to Frank
looks at Frank . brushes crumb off Frank
<1u-2u> picks crumbs off hand and puts to Frank's mouth
moves hands to wipe off crumbs
<aft> lifts up Frank . goes to get tissue .
